Class Game

java.lang.Object
  Game

public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

This is game class and it helps for playing the lucking vending machine game using player and lucky number generator classes as objects here.

Version:
(1.1 06/08/2017)
Author:
(Sunil Cyriac scyr0001@student.monash.edu)

 void playGame()
          This is playGame method, this method allows as to start & play the LuckyVendingMachine game (Note: in the Game class all the methods except the playGame method are kept private to keep the interface simple, for comments on each methods and its code please check the code)
